messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name:  I will derive this data from the following paragraph: INCIDENT REPORT: #G-4509-TY DATE: 04/22/33  A major bank heist took place at Central City Bank on the intersection of Elm Street and Martin Drive. The robbers made away with an estimated $10 million, using sophisticated methods to bypass the bank's alarm system and security measures.  LAW ENFORCEMENT RESPONSE:  LEAD DETECTIVE: Detective T. U. V. Malone has been working closely with federal agencies given the scale of the heist. Known for cracking some of the most intricate cases, Detective Malone has a reputation for being thorough and relentless. TECH ANALYSIS: Detective W. X. Y. Bennett, a tech specialist, has been trying to decode the malware used by the robbers to disable the bank's security systems. OPERATIONS HEAD: Captain Z. A. B. Fitzgerald has been spearheading the coordination efforts between various departments and ensuring the smooth flow of information. ON-GROUND RESPONSE: Patrol Officer C. D. E. Reynolds and Patrol Officer F. G. H. Lopez were the initial officers to arrive post the alarm trigger. Their quick response ensured that crucial evidence was not lost. UNDERCOVER: Detective I. J. K. Norris has been placed undercover, mingling with known felons in hopes of catching a lead on the stolen cash. The gravity of the robbery has rattled the banking community, prompting a review of security protocols across all city banks. Central City Police Department is under pressure to nab the culprits swiftly.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Detective T. U. V. Malone  
Officer Context: Detective Malone is leading the investigation and coordinating with federal agencies.  
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Detective W. X. Y. Bennett  
Officer Context: Detective Bennett is working on the technical aspects of the heist, specifically decoding the malware used.  
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Captain Z. A. B. Fitzgerald  
Officer Context: Captain Fitzgerald oversees the coordination efforts among various departments for the investigation.  
Officer Role: Captain 

Officer Name: Patrol Officer C. D. E. Reynolds  
Officer Context: Patrol Officer Reynolds was among the first to arrive at the bank post-robbery.  
Officer Role: Patrol Officer 

Officer Name: Patrol Officer F. G. H. Lopez  
Officer Context: Patrol Officer Lopez assisted in securing the bank and gathering preliminary evidence.  
Officer Role: Patrol Officer 

Officer Name: Detective I. J. K. Norris  
Officer Context: Detective Norris has gone undercover to seek information related to the heist.  
Officer Role: Detective
